signature: Analysis create(TypeSystem, Core.Pat, SortedMap<Core.NamedPat, Core.Exp>, Iterable<? extends Core.FromStep>, PairList<Core.IdPat, Core.Exp>)

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods process Core.Pat objects, which are used in the setup for the create method.
The create method checks for infinite extents, similar to the isInfinite method.
The create method intersects extents, which is similar to the intersect method's functionality.
The create method unions extents, which is similar to the union method's functionality.
